abstract: The ferocious and long-running battle between Oracle and its German rival, SAP, for pole position in the business software industry took a turn for the courthouse Thursday. Oracle sued SAP accusing the world’s No.1 business software maker of intruding into its computer systems to carry out “corporate theft on a grand scale.”
lead_paragraph: The ferocious and long-running battle between Oracle and its German rival, SAP, for pole position in the business software industry took a turn for the courthouse Thursday. Oracle sued SAP accusing the world’s No.1 business software maker of intruding into its computer systems to carry out “corporate theft on a grand scale.”

headline.main: Oracle Says SAP Stole Its Software
